title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

Seen on a bottle of mineral water: “Purified using naturally occurring ceramic earths, coconut and anthracite carbons, ion exchange and ultra-violet light, this bottle contains water that has a clarity and taste that are unbeatable.”[Submitted by Tony Hall, Aylesbury. “Seems a lot of trouble to go to, just to make a bottle . . .”]
